bio.singa.simulation.model.sections

Class ConcentrationPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.simulation.model.sections.ConcentrationPool

  • public class ConcentrationPool
extends java.lang.Object
    The concentration pool manages the MolarConcentration of ChemicalEntitys in CellSubsections.

      Creates a new, empty concentration pool.
